attributes.action: legalise citizen's arrest for the crime of inciting ethnic or racial hatred
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give the general public the right to arrest any persons in the process of inciting ethnic or racial hatred in a public place or across any public medium. This would further the cause for a racist free Britain and encourage companionship across ethnic groups, greater respect for foreign nationals and make modern Britain a nation free from the spread of racial or ethnic discrimination.
